scripts.automation:default: npm run report:clean && QP_ENV=master wdio run config/wdio.chrome.conf.ts
scripts.automation:headless:default: npm run report:clean && QP_ENV=master wdio run config/wdio.chromeHeadless.conf.ts
scripts.automation:default:edge: npm run report:clean && QP_ENV=master wdio run config/wdio.edge.conf.ts
scripts.localhost:default: npm run report:clean && QP_ENV=localhost wdio run config/wdio.chrome.conf.ts
scripts.localhost:headless:default: npm run report:clean && QP_ENV=localhost wdio run config/wdio.chromeHeadless.conf.ts
scripts.automation:win32: npm run report:clean && setx QP_ENV 'master' && wdio run config/wdio.chrome.conf.ts
scripts.automation:headless:win32: npm run report:clean && setx QP_ENV 'master' && wdio run config/wdio.chromeHeadless.conf.ts
scripts.localhost:win32: npm run report:clean && setx QP_ENV 'localhost' && wdio run config/wdio.chrome.conf.ts
scripts.localhost:headless:win32: npm run report:clean && setx QP_ENV 'localhost' && wdio run config/wdio.chromeHeadless.conf.ts
scripts.localhost:win32:edge: npm run report:clean && setx QP_ENV 'localhost' && wdio run config/wdio.edge.conf.ts
scripts.jenkins:headless: npm run report:clean && wdio run config/wdio.chromeHeadless.conf.ts
scripts.eslint: eslint service-layer/ config/ pages/ step-definitions/ support/ --ext .ts,.js --no-fix --debug
scripts.eslint:fix: eslint service-layer/ config/ pages/ step-definitions/ support/ --ext .ts,.js --fix --debug

hooks.pre-commit: yarn build && yarn eslint && yarn gherkin-lint
